column4: I was just wondering if anyone here could possibly recommend a program for creating flow charts, and that sort of thing (similar to inspiration, the most widely known type to help understand what im asking.)
- have you looked at openoffice?  it includes opendraw which is like powerpoint
Ive used openoffice, although i havnt looked to closely at opendraw, i want something that will be able to do this: http://tiny.cc/51NQP
